description:
When the body of Asuka, the restaurant`s owner, is found in the storeroom, Conan suspects the sommelier Yamada, the waiter Konoe, and the waitress Reiko. Inspector Megure`s suspicion towards Higo and Yoko, the first ones to discover the body, deepens. Conan notices something strange about the blanket Asuka was wearing while he slept. Recalling the restaurant staff`s testimony, Conan closes in on the truth and checks the lockers in the break room. Upon seeing Asuka`s clothes in the locker, he sees through the trick the culprit used to fabricate his alibi...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Suspects Are a Passionate Couple (Part 2)
容疑者は熱愛カップル (後編)
